name: Dino's
description:
Modes

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game has a single-player mode with multiple basic platforming levels. There's also a multiplayer mode! Using the same keyboarding, you can play a chaotic soccer-like game in a selection of arenas.

Development

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The single-player mode is currently in development as of right now. The multiplayer mode is just about finished, but will receive tune-ups and visual polishes. 

Air Boigus

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I've been programming for more or less half a year so I'm still not very experienced. Only recently have been starting to post my games on Itch.io, so I still don't really know what's going on here. 

Hopefully you'll enjoy my game at least a little bit though, so uh, yeah.

I don't know how to end this very well so that's it.

Controls

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In the multiplayer mode, which is, so far, the only the mode, Player 1 is WASD and Player 2 is the arrow keys. Also, you can reset the ball with K and the Players with J

The controls list will be integrated in the game soon, I just kinda wanted to get the game out.
